director.name: 马科斯·卡内瓦莱 Marcos Carnevale

introduction: In a high-stakes comedy-drama that illustrates the power of humanity in an increasingly fragmented world, the dreams of five vastly different strangers traveling to Puerto Rico are put on hold when immigration authorities confine them in ‘El Cuartito’. Trapped inside the tiny detention room and cut off from the outside world, the detainees must find a way to understand each other and work as a team to escape before Thanksgiving night.- Toti, a Spanish rocker scheduled to perform a concert in Puerto Rico who is held by USCIS after he produces the wrong visa;- Lina, a fearful and drug-dependent Latina now living in Paris, is detained while trying to enter the U.S. territory with psychotropic drugs;- Jesus, an enigmatic Mexican traveler who has been deported before from the USA.- Mariel, a Puerto Rican blocked from returning to her home country after many years because she cannot prove her U.S. citizenship; and- Santo, a Dominican preacher arrested for carrying a fake missionary visa.Guarded by the incorruptible security officers of ‘El Cuartito’ and facing deportation, each detainee must confront old ghosts and fears as they take destiny into their own hands and become who they have always dreamed of being.
